text: This home is amazing! If you are staying in Austin, I highly recommend this home.  Great location, 10 minute walk to downtown/6th street, and plenty of private parking.  The host made us feel right at home.  The 3 bedrooms are very roomy and very clean.  The living room is very large and has plenty of seating. We booked this home for Austin City Limits and it was perfect!!
title: Downtown Home
